That's a great idea! The local vintage shop might have some hidden gems (pun intended!) that could be perfect for your anniversary gift. Vintage shops often carry one-of-a-kind pieces, and the owner might have access to a network of suppliers or be able to special order something for you.

Since you've already had a positive experience with the shop, it's definitely worth checking out. The owner might remember you and be willing to work with you to find the perfect peridot piece. Additionally, vintage shops often have a more personalized and curated selection, which can make the shopping experience more enjoyable and unique.

Before you visit the shop, you might want to:

1. **Call ahead**: Give the shop a call to ask if they have any peridot pieces in stock or if they can special order something for you.
2. **Be prepared to describe your vision**: Think about what you're looking for in a peridot necklace, such as the style, metal type, and any specific design elements. This will help the owner understand your preferences and make recommendations.
3. **Be open-minded**: Vintage shops often carry unique and one-of-a-kind pieces, so be prepared to consider items that might not be exactly what you had in mind.

By visiting the local vintage shop, you'll not only support a local business, but you might also find a truly unique and meaningful gift for your anniversary.

Good luck, and I hope you find the perfect peridot piece!
